channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 23:03 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 23:03 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 11:03 p.m. An alarm has been sounded in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages.

item.title: 游댮 22:30 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the city of Marganets and the Marganets territorial community. Take shelter!
